snippet: Ms. Doda, who started a topless revolution as a 26-year-old go-go dancer in 1964, had injected her breasts with enough silicone to expand her bra size to 44DD from 34B.
abstract: Carol Doda, go-go dancer for Condor Club in San Francisco who gained notoriety for performance that incited nationwide topless revolution in 1964, dies at age 78.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Doda, who started a topless revolution as a 26-year-old go-go dancer in 1964, had injected her breasts with enough silicone to expand her bra size to 44DD from 34B.

headline.main: Carol Doda, Pioneer of Topless Entertainment, Dies at 78
headline.print_headline: Carol Doda, 78, Pioneer of Topless Entertainment
